subject: Tennis
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Centre Court at Wimbledon, Roland Garros Stadium in Paris, the Foro Italico in Rome and Arthur Ashe Stadium in New York now have company in Spain.
snippet: Centre Court at Wimbledon, Roland Garros Stadium in Paris, the Foro Italico in Rome and Arthur Ashe Stadium in New York now have company in Spain.
